column3: What is your main type of internet connection?
column4: How would you rate the stability of your internet connection in 2025?
column5: On average, how many hours per day do you not have internet connection?
column6: How often did you experience power outages in 2025?
column7: What was the average duration of outages (hours) in 2025?
column8: Do you have a backup power source (e.g., UPS, generator, solar energy)?
column9: If yes, what kind of backup power source do you have?
column10: If yes, how long can it provide power on average per day?
column11: What number and type of devices are available to you?
column12: Do you have a separate workplace at home?
column13: Do you have the necessary accessories (webcam, headset)?
column14: Is your workplace ergonomically equipped (chair, desk, lighting, ventilation)?
